title: Teen dies after shooting at Spartanburg Co. apartment complex
content:
SPARTANBURG, SC (WSPA) – A teen girl has died after a shooting at the Hidden Park Apartments around 8 a.m. Monday morning, according to the Spartanburg County Coroner’s Office.
The coroner’s office says 17-year-old Anna Marie Goode was shot in the stomach Monday morning.
Goode was shot inside an apartment which is located on Spruce St., say deputies.
Three teens were being questioned by deputies earlier this morning, but no one has been charged.
Deputies were using their personal drones to search for clues.
